Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/which/which-2.21.tar.gz
ğŸš echo f4a245b94124b377d8b49646bf421f9155d36aa7614b6ebf83705d3ffc76eaad  which-2.21.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf which-2.21.tar.gz
ğŸš cd which-2.21
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/gnu-which-2.21
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
